name: CopyPaste'sQuotes
0:
”Alexa, open copy paste's quotes”
”Alexa, start copy paste's quotes”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: copy paste's quotes
des:
Over the years I’ve collected some amazing quotes from people of all kinds. Next logical step was to have Alexa read them to me as an inspiration and/or entertainment. Now I’m sharing the collection with the world.

When using the skill, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next quote. Alexa will ask would you like another. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill.

This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
